name: Debug Quest
description:
Debug Quest is an exciting game with casual graphics that everyone can enjoy.
In order to heal the virus-infected game world, you became a vaccine to go on an adventure.
Set up numerous blocks, manipulate characters, go on an adventure, and find the source of the virus.
Please heal the game world by debugging!

How to play

Install blocks to make a road!

You have to make a road using various blocks.
Certain blocks have special powers, so use them in the right place.


Use your items well!

Items have various effects.
You can activate the effect by equipping the item to the slot and pressing the use key.
Use various effects to make your way and defeat the boss to adventure.


Try installing the plugin!

The plugin cannot be installed infinitely.
Equip the plugin by rotating it on the plugin map and take effect.
The power of the plugin lasts forever.


Face the unknown!

You will encounter an unknown situation. You can be rewarded or harmed by making the right choices.
Choose carefully!


Cure the boss!

When you reach the end of the chapter, the boss will appear.
When you acquire a cure item that spawns on the map, a syringe that heals the boss flies.
If you hit enough syringes on the boss, the boss will be cured and you'll advance to the next chapter.


Adventure with unique characters!

Many characters have different personalities
I have it. Go on a fun adventure using your character's abilities!


Change the look of your character!

You can change the character's appearance and effects using KB acquired through play.
Go on an adventure for a new skin for your character!
